General.Name: PolTREG S.A.
General.Description: Poltreg S.A., a biotechnology company, develops therapies for autoimmune diseases. It engages in the research and development of therapies for the treatment of type 1 diabetes in children, and multiple sclerosis. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Gdansk, Poland.

1.Name: Ms. Kamilla Agnieszka Bok
1.Title: Member of the Management Board & Director of Operations
